item.title: Combo Therapy Cuts Steroid Exposure in Giant Cell Arteritis

item.title: Patients Piling on the Pills in Middle Age: Are They Needed?
item.description: Twenty-five percent of patients are taking five or more drugs a day and the risk factors increase with each prescription. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Cannabis May Harm Female Fertility, Fuel Chromosome Errors

item.title: Northern California Struggles to Keep Doctors Amid Cuts
item.description: Doctor shortages may worsen as state and federal budget cuts undermine medical residency training programs. KFF Health News

item.title: Help Patients See Link Between Obesity and Varicose Veins
item.description: Many patients dealing with both conditions may not understand the connection. You can help. Medscape Medical News
